long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You have to adjust the speed properly to prevent the car from flipping, which is more challenging than you might think due to the many dangerous obstacles on the road that challenge you. Can you conquer all the levels in Drive Mad?


HOW TO PLAY?
Move - WASD or Arrow keys

If you want play more game, press Unblocked Games to find more games on our website: https://drivemad.org
